title: GATE 3: Live Data Quality Check
description:
Third AI validation gate. Verify live BigQuery data produces same quality output as fixtures.

## Gate Criteria
- [ ] BigQuery connector returns data in expected format
- [ ] Live data volume is sufficient (>= 30 days, >= 10 ads)
- [ ] Agent output quality matches fixture-based output
- [ ] No new edge cases break classification logic

## Validation Process
1. Run BigQuery tool with TL account
2. Feed live data to Analyze Agent
3. Compare output quality to fixture-based run
4. Check for data quality issues:
   - Missing fields?
   - Unexpected nulls?
   - Date range gaps?

## Pass Criteria
- Live data output is comparable quality to fixtures
- No regressions in classification accuracy
- Performance is acceptable (<30s for analysis)

## Fail Action
Use fixtures for demo (fallback). Live data becomes stretch goal.

## Target Time
Feb 1, 02:00 IST
